page.title: 09THE BEACON SURVEY
page.content: 1.How often do you go to the Beacon? (A).2 times a week or more=1 person (B).Once a week...........=1 person (C).Once a month..........=2 people (D).Once a year...........=7 people (E).Not at all............=5 people 2.If you go to the Beacon,what is your favourite activity there? (A).Snooker...............=1 person (B).Eating................=2 people (C).Squash................=1 person (D).Badminton.............=3 people (E).Gymnastics............=2 people (F).Disco.................=4 people (G).Roller skating........=1 person 3.Is there any other activity that you would like to see organised there? (A).BMX cycling...........=3 people (B).Shooting..............=1 person (C).Swimming..............=1 person
